title: Glacier Bay National Park & Preserve: Flightseeing
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Outdoor Activities     Flightseeing                Flightseeing              One of the best ways to experience the beauty and tremendous expanse of Glacier Bay's mountains, ice, and water is from above! Fly past jagged peaks, winding glaciers, spectacular waters, and wild shorelines of wild Alaska! A wide variety of tours, trips, and itineraries are available. Flight operators providing trips over Glacier Bay fly out of Gustavus, Yakutat, and Haines. For more information contact one of the operators listed below:           Fjord Flying 907-723-2471 Gustavus/Juneau Alaska Seaplanes 907-697-2375 Gustavus/Juneau Seaport Airlines 907-789-0790 Gustavus/Juneau Harris Air 907-966-3050 Drake Air 907-314-0675 Haines  Mountain Flying Service 907-766-3007 Haines Ward Air 800-478-9150 Juneau Yakutat Coastal Airlines 907-784-3831 Yakutat Gulf Air 1-800-YAKUTAT Yakutat
